WRD_LaezelCreche.synopsis: Lae'zel reacts to what she has just learned from the tiefling she questioned - and if the player didn't let her speak, she is mighty pissed about it, though her anger should be quite cool at this stage. Zaith'isk = ZAY-thisk. Kainyank = CANE-yank.

WRD_LaezelCreche_31.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_31.text: The last time a subordinate questioned my judgement, I ate tongue stew that very night.

WRD_LaezelCreche_52.speaker: Shadowheart
WRD_LaezelCreche_52.text: I warned you, didn't I? You ought to reconsider keeping her around, before she causes real trouble.

WRD_LaezelCreche_35.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_35.text: Subordinate? No - we're partners. You'll treat me with respect.

WRD_LaezelCreche_26.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_26.text: Kainyank. Your tantrum proves you no wiser than a hatchling.

WRD_LaezelCreche_4.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_4.text: The teeth-ling was clear. If there are githyanki west of here, that must be our objective. Purification cannot wait.

WRD_LaezelCreche_5.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_5.text: Kainyank. Your tantrum proves you no wiser than a hatchling.

WRD_LaezelCreche_54.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_54.text: Had you allowed me to speak, we would not be left without a plan.

WRD_LaezelCreche_30.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_30.text: We scout the roads and scan the skies for children of Gith. Purification cannot wait.

WRD_LaezelCreche_64.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_64.text: Then I needn't make it again.

WRD_LaezelCreche_62.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_62.text: Tsk. Had you allowed me to speak, we would not be left without a plan.

WRD_LaezelCreche_59.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_59.text: If you've finished scowling at me, what comes next?

WRD_LaezelCreche_49.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_49.text: The teeth-ling was clear. If there are githyanki west of here, that must be our objective. Purification cannot wait.

WRD_LaezelCreche_45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is unhappy to be corrected. Her eyes should roll upwards.

WRD_LaezelCreche_72.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_72.context: NodeContext: Said through her teeth. She is NOT happy about being corrected.

WRD_LaezelCreche_70.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_70.text: I am unfamiliar with the - well, I shall not say 'culture'. 'Custom', perhaps.

WRD_LaezelCreche_11.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_11.text: You will educate me on matters of this Fay-run.

WRD_LaezelCreche_43.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_43.text: The crèche holds the zaith'isk. It will cleanse us of the parasite.

WRD_LaezelCreche_61.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_61.text: By covenant, I can say no more.

WRD_LaezelCreche_33.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_33.text: Tsk. I might have a plan had you allowed me to speak.

WRD_LaezelCreche_40.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_40.text: We scout the roads and scan the skies for children of Gith. Purification cannot wait.

WRD_LaezelCreche_47.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_47.text: You will speak to drow with respect.

WRD_LaezelCreche_57.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_57.text: We are githyanki. You will approach with respect.

WRD_LaezelCreche_37.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_37.text: You shouldn't have to be so rough with him.

WRD_LaezelCreche_22.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_22.text: Goodness me - that's a terrible way to make friends. Must you be so rough?

WRD_LaezelCreche_20.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_20.text: Such cruelty. Is your heart really so cold?

WRD_LaezelCreche_63.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_63.text: The locals prove compliant. A useful trait.

WRD_LaezelCreche_25.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_25.text: Do you plan to be that rough with everyone we meet?

WRD_LaezelCreche_29.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Rising anger, but not shouty anger: very, very cold.NodeContext: Rising anger, but not shouty anger: very, very cold.

WRD_LaezelCreche_28.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_28.text: Soon, you will be vomiting blood and tearing apart your own flesh.
WRD_LaezelCreche_28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Anger still rising. But never yelling.NodeContext: Anger still rising. But never yelling.

WRD_LaezelCreche_69.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_69.text: When the tentacles sprout from your lips, will you still cry that I was rough?
WRD_LaezelCreche_69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.NodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.

WRD_LaezelCreche_12.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_12.text: Enough. Just tell me what's our next move.

WRD_LaezelCreche_42.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_42.text: All right. You made your point.

WRD_LaezelCreche_17.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_17.text: Then I needn't make it again.

WRD_LaezelCreche_3.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_3.text: You're a dab hand at interrogations - we might need that skill again.

WRD_LaezelCreche_21.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_21.text: Chk. A shell so thin requires little to crack it.

WRD_LaezelCreche_44.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_44.text: Zorru was an easy mark. Don't get complacent.

WRD_LaezelCreche_38.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_38.text: Chk. A thin shell requires little to crack it. I will apply more pressure should the situation demand.

WRD_LaezelCreche_19.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_19.text: Goodness me - we'll make no friends that way. Must you be so rough?

WRD_LaezelCreche_65.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_65.text: I beg your pardon. Was I too rough?

WRD_LaezelCreche_34.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_34.text: You shouldn't have to be so rough with him.

WRD_LaezelCreche_6.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_6.text: Cockroaches are survivors. Yet I do not congratulate them.

WRD_LaezelCreche_71.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelCreche_71.text: Such cruelty. Is your heart really so cold?

WRD_LaezelCreche_18.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_18.text: Soon, you will be vomiting blood and tearing apart your own flesh.

WRD_LaezelCreche_13.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelCreche_13.text: When the tentacles sprout from your lips, will you still cry that I was cold?
WRD_LaezelCreche_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.NodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.
